Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ELECTION LAW

Title: Relates to obtaining written acceptance from candidates for certain county committees
Summary: Relates to obtaining written consent from candidates for certain county committees; requires written acceptance, duly acknowledged, from such candidates to be so designated to be filed within ten days of designating petitions for certain committee candidates.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to obtaining written consent from candidates for certain county committees
